attributes.action: Re-channel money from a trident replacement and unnecessary wars to health, education, housing and peace projects
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel we are wasting our money at a time when we need peace in the world - think what a society we could have if we spent less on wasteful war.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Re-channel money from a trident replacement and unnecessary wars to health, education, housing and peace projects."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14002.asp

Prime Minister's Office
